translations.translation: that his striving will most certainly be seen;
That his endeavours will be judged,
and that (the result of) his striving shall soon be seen,
He will certainly see the result of his labor
And that his effort will soon be scrutinised?
And that his deeds will be seen.
And that his striving shall soon be seen-
and that his labouring shall surely be seen,
And that his effort will be seen.
and that [the fruit of] his striving shall soon be seen;
And that his endeavour shall be presently observed.
and that he will soon be shown his endeavour,
That (the fruit of) his striving will soon come in sight:
And that his deeds will be seen,
and that his work is surely seen
And that his efforts will be witnessed.
And that his effort is going to be seen -
[53:40] and that his endeavour will be seen, it will be inspected in the Hereafter,
(And that his effort will be seen) and that his works will be seen,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُ سَوْفَ يُرَىٰ } معناه عَملُهُ

translations.translation: And His saying, "His effort will be seen" - this means that His work will be seen.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَ } كذا ثبت فيما { أَنَّ سَعْيَهُ } أي: سعي كل واحد من أفراد الإنسان خيراً كان أو شراً { سَوْفَ يُرَىٰ } [النجم: 40] في النشأة الأخرى
 مصورة بالصور الحسنة والقبيحة من الدرجات العلية الجنانية
 أو الدركات الهوية النيرانية
